name: Viettel Group
description:
Viettel is growing fast and disrupting markets across the region. To succeed, we want to attract the most forward-thinking employees, ones who aren?t afraid to be entrepreneurial, embrace risks, and create a new kind of company.

Viettel Group is one of the world?s fastest growing telecom operators with over 110 million subscribers and more than 70,000 employees. We have presence in 13 countries in Asia, America and Africa. Besides Telecommunications, Viettel is also specialized in Hi-tech Research and Development, Information Technology, Postal Services, Construction, Commerce, Importing and Exporting, IDC, and so forth.

We are the most valuable brand in Vietnam and among the top 30 most valuable telecom brands in the world.
